tweet.text: Specializing in the history of U.S. national security issues or arms control? Current/recent grad students, apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications accepted from Sept. 28 to Oct. 12 https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/QK13x0keAv
